WorkItem.ClosedComment: no response in extended period of time
WorkItem.Description:
Usually when Armory is down Rawr answer is fast: There is error with loading character or there is no response from armory.
Sometimes Armory is buged. It doesn't answer to Rawr nor to Internet Browser at all.
It cause Rawr to hang during character reloading. "Cancel all" is greyed out, closing window doesn't work.
I can either kill Rawr in Task Manager or unplug network cable (then after a while "armory returned no character" appears).
WorkItem.Summary: Load and reload from Armory bugs

Comments.Message: This should only occur when loading a character that your copy of Rawr does not already have all the required data for. If you can get this to happen with a character you just saved on that machine, please post the character file that demonstrates it.

Are you sure? For me it was coincidence with WoW Armory working weird that day. In my Internet Browser when i tried open Armory it hanged too. No Error 404 - just hang without end.
Are you sure Rawr Armory Reload is immune to a case when Armory does not return Web Page nor Error 404 but just hangs?
In your particular case, right now, are you trying to load in a ProtWarr?
